MenuItem.Text: Build a Map or Yelo Cache File Ex
MenuItem.Description: Builds a cache file with extra Open Sauce arguments from a Scenario tag. Output cache file will be in .yelo format instead of .map if the use-memory-updates is on.

TextItem.Name: Mod Name
TextItem.Description: The name of the mod this scenario belongs to. This will also be used when naming the new data-files

ListItem.Name: Create A New
ListItem.Description: Should new data-files be created before building the cache?

ListItem.Name: Store Resources
ListItem.Description: Should the scenario's bitmaps/sounds/locale data be stored in the data-files?

ListItem.Name: Use Memory Upgrades
ListItem.Description: Does the scenario require Open Sauce's memory upgrades to run? Produces .yelo file instead of .map

FileItem.Name: Scenario
FileItem.Description: Scenario tag to create a map or yelo cache file from.

Tool.Arguments: build-cache-file-ex [Mod Name] [Create A New] [Store Resources] [Use Memory Upgrades] [Scenario]

DirItem.Name: ObjSourceDirectory
DirItem.Description: location of the source obj, relative to the data directory.

DirItem.Name: BspSourceDirectory
DirItem.Description: location of the target bsp, relative to the tags directory.

ListItem.Name: Note
ListItem.Description: The quality to generate the lightmaps at.

LIItem.Text: Replaces lightmap texture coordinates with custom ones loaded from a .obj file.
The .obj File must have lightmaps grouped by object and in ascending order lightmap_0 to lightmap_n.
Best way to ensure this is to export a fresh lightmaps .obj using Aether,
Then Import it into a model program then ONLY edit UV's to ensure the model matches the bsp
